org.gephi.timeline.api
Interface TimelineChart

All Known Implementing Classes:
TimelineChartImpl
public interface TimelineChart

Sparkline type chart visible in the timeline, for instance the number of nodes over time.

Charts are usually created from the Statistics module and data are saved within Attributable.getAttributes(). Columns can be accessed from the graph table in the AttributeModel.getGraphTable().

Author:
Mathieu Bastian
See Also:
TimelineController.selectColumn(org.gephi.data.attributes.api.AttributeColumn)

getY

java.lang.Number getY(java.lang.Number x)
